message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $12000. I believe this is a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a competitive price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the competitive pricing. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the market demand.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to compromise further and offer you the product for $11200. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $10800 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $10800. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you the product for $11000. This is my final offer, as I'm getting close to my minimum price.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $10700 for the product.
I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $10500. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to compromise further.
I understand your position, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $10400 for the product.
